nodes.text: The Yutan system was a star system that was located within the Ombakond sector, a part of the galactic regions known as the Expansion Region and the Slice. The system was the origin point of the Middle Yutanese language.
The Yutan system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the system in grid square P-12.
